Zombie Party: Coin Mania

Brief:

Embark on a spooky yet thrilling adventure with "Zombie Party: Coin Mania," where your mission is to vanquish the supernatural squatters and reap a bounty of coins left behind on the driveway. Packed with 3D graphics and a plethora of enchanting gifts, characters, and pulse-pounding Halloween quests, this game promises a spine-tingling good time complete with month-long live events that keep the excitement in perpetual motion.
